data.localisation

Class Localisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.localisation.Localisation

  • public class Localisation
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class which manage the differents languages. Its use the localisation files located in resources/localisation. The file have to be writed specifically : Each line represent one message in this format : "key:message" Change Language with the method setLocalisation(String).
    Author:
    Arya JEMO, Bastien LEPESANT, Lucas NICOSIA

      • setLocalisation

        public void setLocalisation(java.lang.String localisation)
        Set the language of the program
        Parameters:
        localisation - Language use in the program. The String have to correspond to a file in location folder (ex : "location_en.txt" for String "en")

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the message which correspond to the key
